Keywords: Fantastic Four , Power Pack
Real Name: Alex Power
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Captain, Sidekick
TIME FOR US TO GO: Sidestep. When Alex Power uses it, after resolutions you may move a friendly Sidekick up to 2 squares.
EARTHEN WALL: Barrier. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers that can't be diagonally adjacent to each other.

DatHomieSilverSurfer
Fun piece but I’m annoyed they mixed the sculpts up, this dial should have the FF costume and the other dial with the power pack trait should easily have the power pack costume
February 11, 2021
Goop
You may think that triple target incap is great but with 4 range that is a major drawback. Honestly the free barrier is why you want him to protect your weaker sidekicks. The shared sidestep is extremely useful as well.
